name: Macroquad Thrusters
description:
Use the arrow keys to move around.

This was to test exporting to web using macroquad, built in Rust.

This is a very simple project I worked on to help learn Rust. I've also developed a perverse fascination with web-exports, this was also to investigate that somewhat.

Click here to see the source.

The assets folder is missing, since this uses a bunch of Half-Life SFX for added humor. If for some reason you want to compile this, you'll need to edit the game_sounds.rs file to use new sounds, or remove the sounds entirely.
